name: beachy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the beach or making you think of the beach: The candle filled the room with a beachy scent that reminded them of summer holidays. The restaurant was decked out in surf memorabilia to give it that beachy feeling.
More examplesFewer examplesThe band plays a lot of beachy tunes that are the perfect background music for a summer party. I am looking for a beachy getaway where I can sit idly in the sun and sip a margarita. Much of his wardrobe consists of sandals, shorts and beachy pastels.
